title: Lions an NFC North sleeper, Mark Ingram suspended, Kurt Warner back?? (Football 05/09)
description:
Tori Petry of DetroitLions.com joins Will Brinson to break down the Lions draft class, talk about how Frank Ragnow and the rest of an SEC-heavy group fits into the roster, discuss the running game and whether it will finally be good, hash out what kind of defensive approach Matt Patricia will use with this team, question whether Golden Tate will get a new contract and more. Will also breaks down Mark Ingram's suspension, Kurt Warner's apparently considered return to football and more.
